org.openstreetmap.travelingsalesman.trafficblocks
Class TrafficMessageStore

java.lang.Object
  org.openstreetmap.travelingsalesman.trafficblocks.TrafficMessageStore

public final class TrafficMessageStore
extends java.lang.Object

This is a database to store received messages about traffic congestions.
Message-storage is independent of the source of the traffic-messages (TMC, web-site, Car2Car, ...).
As they are often refered to in traffic related messages this database also keeps an index of all map-entities that are tagged with LocationCodes of the TMC-service.

Author:
Marcus Wolschon
See Also:
TMCLocationIndexer

                             long aId)
Add a map-entity that is refered by using a TMC location-code to our database.

Parameters:
aCountryID - the country the code is from
aTableID - the country-specific table the code is from
aLocationCode - the location-code
aTmcElementType - "Point", "Line" or "Area"
aType - the type of map-entity (Node, Way, Relation)
aId - the ID of the map-entity

                                                                         int aSteps,
                                                                         IDataSet aMap,
                                                                         boolean aBothDirections)
Get all map-entities in the map with the given TMC location-code.

Parameters:
aCountryID - the country the code is from
aTableID - the country-specific table the code is from
aLocationCode - the location-code
aMap - the map to get entities from by their ID.
aBothDirections - true if both directions are affected
aSteps - how many steps (next/prev-LocationCode) to go in a direction
aDirectionIsReverse - what direction to go in
Returns:
the entities

addTrafficMessageSource

public void addTrafficMessageSource(ITrafficMessageSource aSource)
Register another source of Traffic Messages. This may be used my a GUI and is not required for the operation of this class.

Parameters:
aSource - the source to register.
